Help:Node.title: Command Usage: @speak
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: @speak; or @speak [language]
EXAMPLE: @speak ; @speak western
"@speak" can be used to determine which language you are using and which languages you are fluent in. Just type "@speak" without any arguments ("@speak").
You can also type "@speak [language]" to begin speaking in one of the languages listed for you via "@speak". Everything you say, write, etc., will be done in that language until you choose to speak in another language.
SEE TOPICS: communicate, language
